alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jewell, southwestern Nuckolls and southeastern Webster Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mankato, or 24 miles northwest of Beloit, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Esbon around 915 PM CDT. Burr Oak around 920 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bostwick, Guide Rock and Cowles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
